This file contains information describing individual S-NPP/VIIRS 750m 6-min Level-1 (swath) granules affected by poorly calibrated
data. As a result of these Level-1 data anomalies, the downstream Level-2 (swath) VNP14 data presented large number of spurious
fire pixels. Those corrupted data have been excluded from the VNP14ML files.

This list will be updated regularly as new information becomes available.

Individual entries carry the VIIRS data acquisition date and time using the Level-1/Level-2 granule standard 6-min format:

YYYYJJJ.HHMM
Where:
YYYY    = year
JJJ     = julian day (0-366)
HHMM    = hour and minutes in UTC

List of affected granules identified in the 19 Jan 2012 - 30 Sep 2019 time series (last updated 31 October 2019):

2012019.0230
